name: Polterheist (itch) (Prestosaur)
description:
A haunted mansion, a detective, a story old as time. By getting the ghosts their proper items, maybe you can set them all free.

This was a project I created with a team for a class assignment last year. I got permission from my teammates to upload this. Uploaded now for the sake of adding to my portfolio. The vision for the project kept changing throughout development so it's kind of a mishmash of ideas. Still, it is a challenging platformer.
